data.title: Arizona Motorcycle Accident News
data.meta_description: Find the latest news on motorcycle accidents throughout Arizona, including Phoenix, Prescott, Payson, Tucson, Mesa, Gilbert, Chandler,  Glendale and Flagstaff.
data.text:
Two People Killed in Motorcycle Accident with Motorhome Outside Prescott

Jonathan V. O'Steen

February 24, 2021

Two people riding a motorcycle were killed when their bike collided with a motorhome just outside of Prescott on Tuesday afternoon.Â The Yavapai County Sheriff’s Office reports that the motorcycle was southbound on Iron Springs Road between Prescott and Skull Valley when it crossed the center line and collided head-on with the motorhome.Â

One Dead Following Motorcycle Crash in Mesa

Sean M. McGarry

February 13, 2021

A motorcycle accident at First Avenue and Alturas Street on Sunday night claimed the life of Erik Dominic Guzman. Â Mr. Guzman was riding his Yamaha YZFR1 northbound on First Avenue when a Jeep Gladiator eastbound on Alturas Street failed to yield at a stop sign. The Jeep Gladiator, driven by Daniel W. Foster, collided with the motorcycle operated by Mr. Guzman.

Eric Dominic Guzman Killed in Motorcycle Accident

Matthew P. MacLeod

January 18, 2021

A motorcycle accident at First Avenue and Alturas Street on Sunday night claimed the life of Erik Dominic Guzman. Â Mr. Guzman was riding his Yamaha YZFR1 northbound on First Avenue when a Jeep Gladiator eastbound on Alturas Street failed to yield at a stop sign. The Jeep Gladiator, driven by Daniel W. Foster, collided with the motorcycle operated by Mr. Guzman.

Officer Joseph Montgomery Dies of Injuries from Motorcycle Accident

Jonathan V. O'Steen

January 14, 2021

A 13-year veteran of the ASU campus police force died of injuries he received when his motorcycle struck a freeway off-ramp wall this morning.Â DPS reports that Officer Joseph Montgomery was on his way to the ASU Tempe campus when his motorcycle struck the northbound off-ramp wall of the University Drive exit off Loop 101.

John Myers Killed in Phoenix Motorcycle Accident

Lincoln Combs

January 6, 2021

A three-vehicle crash claimed the life of John Myers, age 62, on Tuesday afternoon near Union Hills Drive and 43rd Avenue. Â It happened when a car traveling eastbound on Union Hills Drive turned left across the path of Mr. Myers’ motorcycle.Â The motorcycle went on to strike another car.Â

Motorcyclist Killed in Accident at 37th Avenue and Dunlap

James R. Harrison

December 16, 2020

A motorcyclist, identified only as a 25-year-old man, was westbound on Dunlap Avenue on Tuesday afternoon when a Chrysler 300 failed to yield while turning left near 37th Avenue. The motorcyclist was thrown from his bike and died of his injuries.

Wrong-Way Driver on SR-51 Seriously Injures Motorcyclist

Van O'Steen

November 2, 2020

A vehicle traveling south in the northbound lanes of SR-51 collided with a motorcyclist near Glendale Avenue on Sunday night. Â The motorcyclist was transported to a nearby hospital for treatment of serious injuries. Â The wrong-way driver was not hurt.

Motorcyclist Killed by Drunk Driver

James R. Harrison

April 23, 2020

An as-yet unidentified female motorcyclist died of injuries she received when a car turned in front of her in central Phoenix yesterday.Â The 30-year-old woman was southbound on 20th Street just south of Highland Avenue when an impaired driver, later identified as Martez Lyle Begay, age 23, crossed her path.

Michael Trousdale Killed in Tempe Hit-and-Run Accident

Jonathan V. O'Steen

March 3, 2020

The Arizona Department of Public Safety is asking for the public’s help in finding a driver who struck and killed a motorcyclist on US-60 on Monday.Â Michael Trousdale was riding his black Harley-Davidson motorcycle on the 60 near McClintock Drive when he was struck.Â

Timothy Romanoski Killed in Motorcycle Accident in North Phoenix

Jonathan V. O'Steen

January 18, 2020

Timothy Romanoski was killed on Friday evening in a motorcycle accident that occurred at 35th Avenue and Union Hills Drive in Phoenix. According to investigators, Mr. Romanoski was operating his motorcycle eastbound on Union Hills Drive when a vehicle turned left in front of him.

Clayton Matheson Killed in Motorcycle Accident in Tucson

James R. Harrison

December 26, 2019

Clayton Matheson has died as a result of injuries he sustained in a motorcycle accident in Tucson last Thursday. According to investigators with the Tucson Police Department, Mr. Matheson collided into the rear passenger door of a Honda Accord at Speedway Boulevard and Olsen Avenue. Mr. Matheson was wearing a helmet at the time of the crash.

Scottsdale Police Motorcycle Officer Injured During Traffic Stop

Kathryn K. McCormick

December 18, 2019

A Scottsdale Police motorcycle officer was injured during a routine traffic stop this morning when a green Ford pickup truck veered into the northbound median of Loop 101 and ran into the stopped car and officer’s motorcycle, pinning the officer and his bike against the median wall.

Phoenix Police Officer Blake Newman Dies in Motorcycle Accident

Jonathan V. O'Steen

December 17, 2019

Phoenix Police Officer Blake Newman died as a result of injuries he received when his motorcycle struck a curb, causing him to lose control and crash.Â Officer Newman was off-duty when the accident occurred near 95th Avenue and Maryland Avenue at about 11:00 p.m. on Monday night.

Tucson Motorcycle Accident Claims Life of Dale Foxworthy

Van O'Steen

December 8, 2019

Tucson Police were called to the city’s north side on Wednesday evening in response to a collision between a motorcycle and an SUV.Â Accident investigators determined that Dale Foxworthy was riding his motorcycle southbound on North Castro Avenue.Â As he started to make a turn onto West Laguna Street, his bike was struck by an SUV that ran through a stop sign at the intersection.

Edward Ward Killed in Motorcycle Accident Near Tucson Mall

Van O'Steen

December 2, 2019

A collision between a motorcycle and a car near Tucson Mall on Wednesday afternoon left one man dead.Â Edward Ward was on his motorcycle southbound in the curb lane of Oracle Road.Â The as-yet unidentified driver of a Ford Escape was northbound on Oracle in the left turn lane.

Andrew Totten Killed in Motorcycle Accident in Tucson

James R. Harrison

November 15, 2019

A collision between a motorcycle and a car on Wednesday night claimed the life of Andrew Totten. Tucson Police Department accident investigators report that Mr. Totten was northbound on Alvernon Way in the inside lane when his motorcycle struck a Toyota Avalon that was turning onto Broadway Boulevard.Â

Noah Clementson Killed in Phoenix Motorcycle Accident

Van O'Steen

November 13, 2019

Noah Clementson died from injuries he received when his motorcycle was struck from behind on Loop 101 in Phoenix. Â The collision threw Mr. Clementson onto the roadway where he was struck by two other vehicles as he attempted to crawl to safety.

Dennis MacLean Killed in Motorcycle Accident in Bullhead City

Jonathan V. O'Steen

November 8, 2019

A motorcyclist died following a collision with a school bus early Wednesday morning.Â Dennis Lawrence MacLean was northbound on Highway 95 when the bus, operated by the Bullhead City Elementary School District, turned left from Wolf Court onto Highway 95.Â Mr. MacLean’s motorcycle struck the left side of the bus which had eight students on board.

Multi-Vehicle Accident Involving Motorcycle Sends Two to Hospital with Serious Injuries

O'Steen & Harrison, PLC

September 16, 2019

Two people were transported to a hospital early this morning following a crash between a tow truck, a minivan and a motorcycle.Â Maricopa County Sheriff’s Office accident investigators report that the incident occurred in the vicinity of University Drive and Recker Road, near Main Street in Mesa.

Kenneth Shelley Killed in Motorcycle Accident in Mesa

Jonathan V. O'Steen

June 13, 2019

Kenneth Wayne Shelley died as the result of injuries he received last Friday when a car turned left in front of him as he was riding his motorcycle north on Dobson Road near Southern Avenue in Mesa.Â The driver, identified as Anrisa Sukion, parked her vehicle and fled.

Christopher Steffes Killed in Motorcycle Accident Outside Prescott Valley

Jonathan V. O'Steen

May 20, 2019

A motorcycle accident that occurred on Friday afternoon on Highway 89A near Prescott Valley has claimed the life of Christopher Steffes. The deadly accident was investigated by the Arizona Department of Public Safety. According to accident investigators, Mr. Steffes was southbound on Highway 89A near Legend Hills Drive when a sedan pulled out in front of him. He was wearing a helmet and appropriate safety equipment.

Motorcycle Accident in North Phoenix Claims Life of Korbin Massey

Jonathan V. O'Steen

May 12, 2019

Korbin Massey was killed as he rode his motorcycle northbound on Cave Creek Road near Utopia Road in north Phoenix on Saturday. Detectives report that a woman driving a Honda Civic was attempting to exit a private driveway to proceed southbound on Cave Creek Road when she turned left into the path of Mr. Massey's motorcycle.

William Curran Killed in Motorcycle Accident in South Phoenix

Jonathan V. O'Steen

March 4, 2019

William Curran died as a result of injuries he sustained in a motorcycle accident that occurred on Sunday evening. According to accident investigators, Mr. Curran was operating his motorcycle near 48th Street and Baseline Road when a vehicle driven by Thane Dennison turned left into the path of the motorcycle.

Kevin Vazquez-Teran Killed in Phoenix Motorcycle Accident

Jonathan V. O'Steen

March 1, 2019

Kevin Vazquez-Teran was killed yesterday when a vehicle collided with his motorcycle at the intersection of 40th Street and Cactus Road in Phoenix. According to accident investigators, Mr. Vazquez-Teran was operating his motorcycle westbound on Cactus Road when the driver of a Nissan Altima turned left in front of him.

Gerald Dodson Killed in Hit-and-Run Accident

Jonathan V. O'Steen

January 22, 2019

Gerald Dodson died of injuries he received when his motorcycle collided with a car that was pulling into a parking lot on Southern Avenue near Val Vista Drive on Sunday evening. Aaron Powell was driving his car eastbound and turned left in front of Mr. Dodson's motorcycle. Powell fled the scene of the collision but returned several hours later.

Stephen Florio Killed in Tucson Motorcycle Accident

O'Steen & Harrison, PLC

November 26, 2018

Stephen Florio died as the result of injuries he received in a motorcycle accident on Saturday afternoon.Â Tucson Police investigators report that Mr. Florio was riding his Harley-Davidson westbound on 22nd Street near Fordham Drive when a sedan pulled in front of his motorcycle from a side street.

Renee Doty Dies Following Tucson Motorcycle Accident

Jonathan V. O'Steen

August 1, 2018

Renee Doty died as the result of injuries she received in a motorcycle accident on Stone Avenue on Sunday night. Â Ms. Doty was the passenger on the back of a motorcycle that was northbound on Stone near Limberlost Drive.

Dalton Hall Killed in mesa Motorcycle Accident

Van O'Steen

July 27, 2018

Mesa Police have identified Dalton Hall as the rider killed in the motorcycle accident on McKellips Road in Mesa on Wednesday night. Mr. Hall was eastbound on McKellips when a vehicle traveling westbound turned left in front of him at 56th Street.

Fatal Motorcycle Accident Reported in Mesa

Van O'Steen

July 26, 2018

Accident investigators with the Mesa Police Department are reporting that a motorcyclist died of injuries he received in a collision with a car near McKellips Road and Alta Mesa Drive on Wednesday evening. The victim has not yet been identified.Â

Motorcycle Accident in Scottsdale Claims Life of Kristopher Koch

Jonathan V. O'Steen

February 24, 2018

Kristopher Koch was killed in Thursday after his motorcycle collided with an SUV in Scottsdale. According to investigators with the Scottsdale Police Department, Mr. Koch was operating his motorcycle westbound on McDowell Road and crossing 64th Street when the SUV turned left in front of him.

Linda Gonzales Seriously Injured in Freak Motorcycle Accident

Van O'Steen

February 21, 2018

Linda Gonzales remains hospitalized in intensive care following a bizarre accident while riding a motorcycle driven by her fiancÃ©, Ron Bondy. The couple was enjoying an afternoon ride near their home in the vicinity of Pantano and Irvington Roads on February 7th when the accident occurred. Near their destination, Mr. Bondy reached forward to activate a switch on the motorcycle, just as their motorcycle ran into a flat-braid rope suspended over the roadway. Ms. Gonzales took the full brunt of the force of the collision. Accident investigators reported the rope was tied to a tree on one side of the roadway and a mailbox on the other. They determined the couple was traveling at about 15 miles per hour.

Motorcycle Accident in Surprise Claims Life of Tyler Deskins

Jonathan V. O'Steen

December 6, 2017

A motorcycle accident in Surprise on Tuesday afternoon has claimed the life of Tyler Deskins. According to accident investigators, the motorcycle operated by Mr. Deskins collided with two vehicles in the intersection of Bell Road and Sunrise Boulevard. Mr. Deskins was wearing a helmet at the time of the crash.

Cory Mork Awakens from Coma Following Motorcycle Accident

O'Steen & Harrison, PLC

November 14, 2017

Cory Mork has awakened from a month-long coma following an accident in early October that left him with broken bones in both legs, pelvis, hands, an elbow and a wrist.Â He was injured after a wrong-way driver crossed the center line and struck Mr. Mork’s motorcycle head-on.

Robert Demar Killed in Fiery Motorcycle Accident on Loop 101

Jonathan V. O'Steen

October 31, 2017

A motorcycle accident on Loop 101 in North Scottsdale has claimed the life of Robert Demar. According to accident investigators with the Arizona Department of Public Safety, Mr. Demar stopped his disabled bike on the left shoulder of northbound Loop 101 and activated the hazard lights. A pickup truck then ran onto the shoulder and struck Mr. Demar and his motorcycle.

Sabrina Gillis Killed in Motorcycle Accident in Phoenix

James R. Harrison

September 15, 2017

Sabrina Gillis died when the motorcycle on which she was a passenger collided with a car on Thursday.Â The motorcycle was heading west on Union Hills Drive when a car turned left in front of it at 35th Avenue.

Celso Salinas-Mireles Killed by Red Light Runner

James R. Harrison

August 2, 2017

Celso Salinas-Mireles was killed Tuesday morning when a woman reportedly ran a red light and crashed into his motorcycle.Â The tragic accident occurred near 12th Street and Missouri.Â The crash was investigated by the Phoenix Police Department and the driver of the vehicle was cited for a red light violation and driving without a driver's license.

Cindy Meade Killed by Wrong-Way Driver on I-17

Jonathan V. O'Steen

July 5, 2017

A wrong-way driver sideswiped several cars as he drove north in the southbound lanes of Interstate 17 on Tuesday afternoon. Darroll Roberts ran over motorcyclist Cindy Lee Meade, killing her instantly. Â The wrong-way vehicle traveled for several hundred feet more until it stopped after striking a guardrail.

SUV Strikes, Injures Motorcyclist in Tempe

Van O'Steen

March 24, 2017

A motorcyclist was struck by a SUV that was turning left near Guadalupe and Rural roads in Tempe late Friday afternoon. According to Tempe Police Department accident investigators, the motorcyclie was northbound on Rural Road when the SUV turned left in front of him.Â The collision caused the SUV to roll.

Paul Seebeck and Dale Smith Killed in Motorcycle Crash

James R. Harrison

October 3, 2016

Paul Russell Seebeck of Bullhead City and Dale Martin Smith of Topock were killed in a motorcycle accident last Friday afternoon.Â Bullhead City police accident investigators determined that Mr. Seebeck was driving the motorcycle while Mr. Smith was his passenger.

Christopher Campbell Killed in Tucson Motorcycle Accident

O'Steen & Harrison, PLC

October 2, 2016

Christopher Campbell was killed Saturday night when his motorcycle collided with a 2006 Saturn.Â Accident investigators determined that Mr. Campbell was eastbound on Pima in the inside lane between North Wilmot and North Craycroft roads.Â His motorcycle struck the passenger side of the Saturn as it turned left onto Sahuaro Road.

Couple's High-Speed Chase Ends in Fatality

James R. Harrison

September 26, 2016

A violent domestic dispute turned deadly when a wife in a SUV pursued her husband at high speeds until he crashed his motorcycle into a lamp post, killing him instantly.Â Jennie Jones-Hurdlow and her husband, Brian E. Hurdlow, were embroiled in a domestic dispute that began Saturday evening. Â The argument continued through late Sunday morning as Brian left their house for a trip to the nearby convenience store. Jones-Hurdlow followed him in her SUV.

Phillip Grant Killed in Motorcycle Accident on U.S. 60

Van O'Steen

September 15, 2016

An accident claimed the life of a motorcyclist during the Thursday afternoon rush hour on U.S. 60 near the Mill Avenue exit.Â Phillip Grant of Chandler was riding his motorcycle in the HOV lane when he collided with another vehicle. This first impact sent Mr. Grant into a second vehicle in the adjacent lane.Â A Tempe Fire Department spokesman said Mr. Grant laid his bike down before being thrown into traffic where he was struck.

John Whiteside Dies in Motorcycle Collision

James R. Harrison

August 31, 2016

John Whiteside of Cibola, Arizona died when his motorcycle collided with an SUV in Palm Desert on Thursday afternoon.Â Mr. Whiteside was southbound on Cook Street when his motorcycle collided with a Mercedes SUV that was turning left onto Frank Sinatra Drive.

Border Patrol Agent Manuel Alvarez Killed in Motorcycle Accident

O'Steen & Harrison, PLC

August 12, 2016

Manuel Alvarez was killed when he collided with another agent as they patrolled Arizona’s southern border last Friday morning.Â According to Border Patrol Chief Paul A. Beeson, Mr. Alvarez was a 13-year veteran of the Casa Grande Station of the Tucson Sector.

Kevin Terry Dies in Glendale Motorcycle Crash

Jonathan V. O'Steen

July 4, 2016

Kevin Douglas Terry was killed over the weekend when the motorcycle he was riding was struck by a pickup truck. The incident occurred at the intersection of 45th Avenue and Camelback Road in Glendale.

Glendale Police Department accident investigators report that Mr. Terry apparently was heading east on Camelback when his motorcycle was struck by the pickup truck traveling north on 45th Avenue, causing the truck to flip and come to rest on its side.

Rodrigo Ortega Saldate Killed in Motorcycle Crash

Jonathan V. O'Steen

June 15, 2016

Rodrigo Ortega Saldate died of injuries he received in a crash Wednesday morning around 6:00 a.m. Mr. Ortega Saldate was riding his three-wheeled Can-Am Spyder motorcycle westbound on Speedway Boulevard when an eastbound Ford Transit van turned left onto Main Avenue in front of him.

Michael Robert Killed in Motorcycle Crash

James R. Harrison

June 15, 2016

Michael Robert was killed Tuesday night just outside Marana when his motorcycle was struck by a truck towing a trailer. Mr. Robert was traveling southbound on Trico Road when a westbound truck driven by David Huntley ran through an intersection stop sign.

Motorcycle Accident Near Pine Critically Injures Two

Van O'Steen

May 24, 2016

A motorcyclist and his passenger were both critically injured Saturday when their bike struck a vehicle head-on. Â Neither rider on the bike has, as yet, been identified by law enforcement accident investigators.

Tyler Woelfersheim Killed in Green Valley Motorcycle Crash

James R. Harrison

May 20, 2016

Tyler Woelfersheim was killed Thursday evening in Green Valley when his motorcycle was struck by a car making a left-hand turn. Pima County Sheriff’s Department accident investigators report that Mr. Woelfersheim was westbound on Continental at about 7:40 p.m.Â The driver of an eastbound car turned north onto Abrego Drive, into the path of Mr. Woelfersheim’s motorcycle.

Michael Freeman Killed in Hit-and-Run Motorcycle Accident

James R. Harrison

May 10, 2016

Michael Freeman was killed Friday evening when a vehicle exiting a private drive pulled directly into the path of his motorcycle.Â The driver fled the scene, which was captured on surveillance video. Accident investigators with the Glendale Police Department say that Mr. Freeman reportedly was traveling west on Northern Avenue at 51st Avenue when the tragic incident occurred.Â Mr. Freeman attempted to lay down his motorcycle, but was unable to avoid the fatal collision.

Juan Manuel Mosqueira Dies in Motorcycle Crash

Van O'Steen

April 26, 2016

Juan Manuel Mosqueira died Tuesday morning when his motorcycle collided with a Peterbilt garbage truck.Â The accident occurred around 8:00 a.m. near Valencia and Country Club Roads. Bystanders rendered first aid until Tucson Fire Department paramedics arrived.Â In spite of their efforts, Mr. Mosqueira succumbed to his injuries.

Vincent Reid Killed, Four-Year-Old Son Injured in motorcycle Accident

Jonathan V. O'Steen

April 23, 2016

Vincent Reid was killed Saturday morning when his motorcycle collided with a garbage truck near 40th Street and Baseline Road.Â A Phoenix Fire Department spokeswoman said Mr. Reid was pronounced dead at the scene. His four-year-old son was a passenger on the motorcycle when the accident occurred.Â

Ronald Hicks Arrested for Fatal Hit-and-Run Motorcycle Crash

James R. Harrison

April 14, 2016

Ronald Luster Hicks was arrested in connection with a fatal crash that occurred on April 7th at Northern and 19th Avenue in Phoenix.Â One motorcycle rider was killed and another seriously injured in the tragic traffic incident.Â The injured rider required an amputation.

Karim Harrison Killed in Motorcycle Accident on I-17

Jonathan V. O'Steen

March 28, 2016

Karim Harrison died early Sunday morning as a result of injuries sustained in an accident on Interstate 17 in Phoenix. According to investigators with the Arizona Department of Public Safety, Mr. Harrison was riding his motorcycle southbound on Interstate 17 and transitioning to eastbound Interstate 10 when he went off the roadway. Mr. Harrison entered the desert area off the freeway and was thrown from his motorcycle.

David Falco Pleads Guilty to Reckless Manslaughter and Endangerment in Death of Shawn Sather

Van O'Steen

March 23, 2016

On July 30, 2015, I wrote about a tragic motorcycle accident that claimed the life of Shawn Sather. David Falco was on the Loop 303 when he collided with the motorcycle driven by Mr. Sather. Mr. Falco has pled guilty to reckless manslaughter and endangerment in Maricopa County Superior Court earlier this month. He will be sentenced on April 22, 2016.

Craig Ammerman Dies in New Mexico Motorcycle Accident

Van O'Steen

January 23, 2016

Craig Ammerman of Tucson died when his motorcycle collided with a van Friday on Interstate 10 outside Deming.Â The cause of the accident is unclear, as both the motorcycle and the van were headed in the same direction.
